feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: But surely we should regard his claim as a much greater one, even to the half of that property which I know that you have destined for me.

causedByEvent.name: Thinking about Will Ladislaw's family history and his claim to property

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: But if one has too much in consequence of others being wronged, it seems to me that the divine voice which tells us to set that wrong right must be obeyed.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Poor Dorothea, shrouded in the darkness, was in a tumult of conflicting emotions.

causedByEvent.name: Receiving a strong response from Mr. Casaubon

feels.name: Resentment
feels.quote: Poor Dorothea, shrouded in the darkness, was in a tumult of conflicting emotions.

causedByEvent.name: Feeling conflicted after Mr. Casaubon's response
